name: Thin Fries
steps: Cut each potato into 1/8"x1/8" fry-length sections (Think McD's)
Soak Fries in Ice Water for 5 minutes
Take Fries out and dry them (doesn't need to be too too thorough)
Mix Water, Sugar, and Corn Syrup
Bring sugary water to a boil
Once boiling, take off heat, then add Fries for 10 minutes
Take out Fries and dry (again, doesn't need to be perfectly dry)
Put the dried Fries in the freezer for 20 minutes (not frozen, cold)
Fry the Fries in the oil for 2 minutes
Store the Fries in the freezer for just about as long as you want
Once you want to serve the Fries, reheat Peanut Oil back to 350F
Take Fries out of the freezer and put them in the 350F Peanut Oil
Fry until light golden (right around 10 minutes)
Salt generously and serve with Ketchup
comments: If you're going to go through the trouble of doing these, might as well make a bunch and freeze
